Attacks.Name: Crunch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character's defense is reduced by 1 for its next defense roll.

Attacks.Name: Hyper Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Knock Off
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character drops one objective token it is holding.

Superpowers.Name: Gluttony
Superpowers.Effect: During the Power Phase, if this character has less than half of its Stamina remaining, it gains 1 additional power.

Superpowers.Name: Thick Fat
Superpowers.Effect: When defending against Fire or Ice-type attacks, this character adds 1 die to its defense roll.

Attacks.Name: Double-Edge
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Gluttony
Superpowers.Effect: During the Power Phase, if this character has less than half of its Stamina remaining, it gains 1 additional power.
